value:
$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|You ARE here. My, my, my...$k$p$EFace_Smile|Still playing with your dolls? They
seem to fascinate you so.$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Do not belittle them, Loki. They
contain strength neither you nor I
possess.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, do they? This despite the fact
that they aren't...real?$k$pThey may look like Heroes, but
they're nothing more than toys
created by Alfaðör.$k$pThey're weaklings. Babies that can
barely walk, let alone fight.$k$p$WmMPID_トール,ch00_22_Tor_F_Normal,Face|That is the very reason I am
interested. They may lack power...
but they are filled with potential.$k$pThey work together, push
themselves...expend every last
drop of strength to grasp victory.$k$pAnd then they acquire new strength.
What do they do then? Use it to take
on stronger foes...$k$p$EFace_Anger|This is what strength is. It is pure and
true.$k$pAnd it is strength we will never know.
You could learn much if you were
to witness their battles.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Fine! Well... I do like battles that
have...a certain element of
uncertainty.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Just how far can these pitiful
dolls go? Perhaps I should take
a look.$k$p
